Using the needit Form

Use the needit aplication to request services and good from several departments.

  • Legal
  • Human Resource
  • Facilities

Needit Form Fields

  1. For new NeedIt records, the Requested for field is pre-populated with your name. If you are opening a Needit request for someone else, you can change the value in the Requested for field.
  2. The Requested for email field is automatically populated if you change the user in the Requester for field. You can change the Requested for eail field value.
  3. The choices in the What needed field depend on the value in the Request tyoe field.
  4. If the value in the What needed field is Other, the Other field appears. Use the Other field to add a few words about your request.
  5. Use the calendr picker in the When needed field to set the due date for the NeedIt request.
  6. User the Short description and Description fields to provice more information about your request.
Note: When creating NeedIt requests, the When needed date cannot be today or in the past.

Need More Help?

You can learn about the form fields on the ServiceNow docs. site.
